info.title: Route Mobile Rich Communication Services (RCS) API Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the Route Mobile developer hub. You will find comprehensive RCS API documentation to help you start working with Route Mobile as quickly as possible and support if you get stuck. Let's jump right in!

For more information, see the [Route Mobile Open API Specifications](https://routemobile.github.io/RCS-Business-Messaging-API/RCS.html)

post.description:
Login APIs provide a secure and standardized way for end users to add user authentication to their applications. Only authorized users can access sensitive resources or perform specific actions within the application after entering the user authentication details.

**By default, the JSON Web Token (JWT) validity periods are set to one hour.**

status.description: The user login status.

value.status: invalid credentials or the account has been deactivated

status.description: The user login status.

post.description:
The Rich Communication Services (RCS) Business Messaging API is a communication protocol that allows businesses to send different types of messages beyond traditional text messages. 

The RCS Business Messaging API allows businesses to send different types of messages that include:

- **Notification API:** Standard messages that send plain text or media content. 
- **Session API:** Standard text messages that send plain text content as part of a campaign. 
- **India Template API:** Create interactive and visually rich content to engage customers.

post.description:
The Payment Template API allows businesses to integrate payment functionality into their RCS messages. With this API, businesses can create payment templates that enable users to make secure payments directly within the RCS messaging experience.

The API will use the provided phone number to send the payment template message to the recipient via RCS. The template will include the specified variables and their corresponding values, allowing you to customize the payment details for each recipient.

rcs_template_text_msg.title: India Template - Text Message
rcs_template_text_msg.description: RCS template APIs allow businesses to leverage the advanced features of RCS messaging and create compelling, interactive, and visually rich content to engage with their customers more dynamically and interactively.

type.description:
The type of the template.

- **Text:** RCS text templates provide a way to create engaging and interactive messaging experiences for businesses. 
- **Rich Card Standalone:** Rich Card Standalone utilizes the Rich Card format to provide visually rich and interactive content. 
- **Rich Card Carousel:** A Rich Card Carousel in RCS allows businesses to present multiple rich media cards in a single message, providing a visually engaging and interactive experience.

phone_no.description: The mobile number to which the message will be sent, including the country code.

bot_name.description: The name of the bot sending the message.

expire_time.description:
The date and time at which the message should be expired and should be in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.
 -Either ttl or expire time can be used in a single message

extra.description: An extra value that can be included in the message. This field is optional.

template.description: An object containing the template information.

name.description: The name or identifier of the text template you want to use.

variables.description: An object containing the variables to be replaced in the template.

{var1}.description: The value to replace the "{var1}" variable in the template.

{var2}.description: The value to replace the "{var2}" variable in the template.

fallback_text.description: The fallback text that is displayed on devices. The fallback text to be sent if the RCS message cannot be delivered. This field supports variable substitution using {#var#} format. It is optional.

rcs_template_sms_fallback_api_msg.title: India Template - SMS Fallback API Message
rcs_template_sms_fallback_api_msg.description: RCS template APIs allow businesses to leverage the advanced features of RCS messaging and create compelling, interactive, and visually rich content to engage with their customers more dynamically and interactively.

type.description:
The type of the template.

- **Text:** RCS text templates provide a way to create engaging and interactive messaging experiences for businesses. 
- **Rich Card Standalone:** Rich Card Standalone utilizes the Rich Card format to provide visually rich and interactive content. 
- **Rich Card Carousel:** A Rich Card Carousel in RCS allows businesses to present multiple rich media cards in a single message, providing a visually engaging and interactive experience.

 -Either ttl or expire time can be used in a single message
